endMessage_eng:
Thank you for completing the task.

Please wait shortly before you close the application.

Seconds remaining:
blockMessage_eng: Before you see the object, you have to go to the location, where you think the object is and press L. After that the object will appear you collect it and move on to the next trial. Press S to start.
Short pause. Please press S to start.
blockMessage_cn: 在看到物体之前，您必须先前往您认为该对象所在的位置并按“L”键。之后该对象将出现，您像之前完成的那样收集它并继续进行下一个试验。按“S”键开始。
